src.tasks package¶

Submodules¶

src.tasks.example module¶

This is just an example. Inside the run method of a task you can do whatever you want. The only requirements are that your run method accepts a single argument - the structure to be transformed or augmented - and returns the transformed/augmented structure so that downstream tasks can make further modifications or update the document in the datastore.

src.tasks.example.run(data)[source]¶
